video.title: Simon Game - Code Vlog {01}
video.description:
View the full Doer Vlog playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbkyQnSv-DNXOKsglcHhYAV2

Repository: https://github.com/ewathedoer/simon-game
Live preview: http://theonewhodo.es/simon-game/

You can find me on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thedoerdoes

-
Music:
Sophomore Makeout, Phife for Life 
from YT Audiolibrary
-
We're busy people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at https://freecodecamp.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/freecodecamp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp
Follow Quincy on Quora: https://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: freeCodeCamp.org
topLevelComment.text: View the full Doer Vlog playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbkyQnSv-DNXOKsglcHhYAV2

topLevelComment.author: Jacco Scholten
topLevelComment.text: Nice optimistic vid! Thanks for sharing the struggle and your GitHub repo. Now i have to figure out how your loop object and loop timer function works ;-)

topLevelComment.author: barry abrams
topLevelComment.text: Gee whiz! I empathize with the long hours and days on a project. You run into a problem that you can't solve. As you marinate on it for a day or two, the answer comes to you or you sought the answer somewhere else. Way to stay with it. Thanks for your vlog.

topLevelComment.author: Amos Baynes
topLevelComment.text: Great work! Also, I love that interstitial music.

topLevelComment.author: West Taiwan
topLevelComment.text:
Wow, literally made my own simon game during some downtime at work this week!

https://github.com/emrickgarrett/SimonSays

topLevelComment.author: Akis Molfetas
topLevelComment.text: Great Job !!! Love to see more videos like this. Don't listen to the haters btw, you're awesome!

topLevelComment.author: Ushio
topLevelComment.text: Awesome video and great job on the game, keep it up!
